name: recipe-why-are-you-hidden
title: 配方，你为什么藏起来！
author: quenenni
description: 有了这个mod，你可以很容易地找到任何在使用过程中丢失的配方(更新后，它会发生)并激活它。还有一个按钮（shift+k），可以扫描并列出所有错误的食谱。这救了我的游戏。
description_original: With this mod, you can easily find any recipe that is missing from crafting (after updates, it can happen) and activate it. There is also a button that can scan and list for you all the recipes that are wrongly unavailable. That saved my game.
